page.title: 03PURLEY TO PANGBOURNE WALK
page.content: Walking from Mapledurham Lock to Whitchurch Toll Bridge was an interesting and exciting experience for a class from the local Long Lane Primary School.The mill could be seen across the river from the lock but the walkway above the weir is incomplete and so the mill cannot be reached on foot.We saw Herons,Swifts,Swallows, Mallards,Coots,Grebes,Canada Geese and Swans.On the lock it says,"London 78.5 miles," and "Oxford 33 miles".We saw Hardwick House across the river and horses in the stud farm but there is very little other building to disturb the view.People on boats waved to us as they passed coming to and from the marina at Purley.Back at school we soon realised how much scope for nature study is right "on our doorstep".
